originalText.text: What a nightmare! The program director of the Masters Direct Entry (MDE) Program--Heidi Hahn Schroeder (HHS)--and the clinical director--Candice Smith--should be enough to avoid this program. Unsupportive, accusatory, abuse of power! Completely unorganized, unqualified "teacher" nurses who make up problems, have a superiority complex, are unsupportive, and actually grade fraud. Get your RN elsewhere. Terrible school! Avoid!

originalText.text: Wish I could review higher but am absolutely shocked at the lack of support this school gives to their alumni. My daughter graduated with her masters. Her last class was August 10, 2019. Columbia did not provide her with her transcript for her to apply for her license for over 70 (SEVENTY) days! She was unable to even APPLY to take her licensing exam for 70 days, and actually longer because now the state she lives in has to process that paperwork! Nursing residency starts November 11. My daughter is still waiting for the paperwork to get processed so she can apply to take the licensing exam. She may not be able to become a nurse until after March 2020 - 7 months after taking her last class from this school. Absolutely ridiculous. Think twice before attending this school! No support whatsoever!
